content.query:
-- Shows total male/female participation by sport.
-- Useful for identifying gender-balanced vs. gender-skewed sports.
SELECT
    Discipline,
    Female,
    Male,
    Total
FROM genders
ORDER BY Total DESC;

-- Determines sports with the strongest women's presence.
-- Helps predict which sports may expand women's events in 2026.
SELECT
    Discipline,
    Female,
    Male,
    Total,
    ROUND(Female * 100.0 / NULLIF(Total, 0), 1) AS FemalePercent
FROM genders
ORDER BY FemalePercent DESC;

-- Provides global gender parity insights for Beijing 2022.
-- The IOC tracks this to measure progress toward parity.
SELECT
    SUM(Female) AS TotalFemale,
    SUM(Male)   AS TotalMale,
    SUM(Total)  AS TotalParticipants,
    ROUND(SUM(Female) * 100.0 / SUM(Total), 2) AS FemalePercent,
    ROUND(SUM(Male)   * 100.0 / SUM(Total), 2) AS MalePercent
FROM genders;
